moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Thief
moves.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.
